All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Body
Generic HTTP body.
CaravanHttpClient
Resilient HTTP transport layer that can execute any request asynchronously and applying software load balancing and circuit breaking.
CaravanHttpRequest
An immutable request to a HTTP server.
CaravanHttpRequestBuilder
UriTemplate using HTTP request builder.
CaravanHttpResponse
An immutable response to an http invocation which only returns string content.
CaravanHttpResponseBuilder
Builder for CaravanHttpResponse.
IllegalResponseRuntimeException
Exception is thrown when a resilient HTTP response was received, but rated illegal (e.g. beause of status code).
RequestFailedRuntimeException
Exception is thrown when a resilient HTTP request failed before a response was received.
RequestInstantiationRuntimeException
Thrown if there was an error by creating a request.
